fulltext:
EDUCATION
FPT UNIVERSITY  /  SEP 2015 - MAY 2019
Major: Software Engineering.
WORK EXPERIENCE
FPT SOTFWARE  /  JAN 2018 - JUL 2018
Full-stack developer intern
Work on CES-BLUE project – a web application to manage
products and customers of energy companies.
Team size: 10 members
Using C#, Microsoft SQL Server, Angularjs.
FPT UNIVERSITY  /  JAN 2016 - MAY 2019
Full-stack developer.
#Restaurant Automation project:
- A web project which allow a restaurant manage products,
tables and booking processes automatically.
- Team size: 5 members.
- Used tech: Java, HTML, CSS, Javascript, SQL.
#Find me project:
- An android project allow a group of people tracking other's
position in a traveling trip using Google's GPS and applications.
- Team size: 3 members.
- Used tech: Android, SQL, Firebase application, Onesignal
application.
#Discuss Forum project:
- An android application that taking StackoverFlow application
as the model, allow teachers and students communicate
together to solve problems.
- Responsibility as Project Manager.
- Team size: 4 members.
- Used tech: Android, SQL, Retrofit API.
#Capstone project: Pose Detection in Self-training
- A system to connect trainees with trainers through Yoga
training videos with an android application plays as the priority
part and a web admin.
- Team size: 4 members.
- Used tech: Android, SQL, Retrofit, Spring Framework, Pose-
net.
Phat Le Thinh
Software Engineer
CONTACT INFORMATION
Jul 6, 1994
 Male
034 253 4854
 phat.lethinh@gmail.com
160/24/9, XVNT street, Binh Thanh
district, Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam



CAREER OBJECTIVE
In short-term goal, improving myself about
both technical knowledge and social skills is
my top priority to become a professional
Software Engineer.
In long-term goal, working as professional
Software Engineer at building software that
empowers engineering teams to develop and
deliver high quality products quickly, also
focus on solving the hardest, most interesting
challenges of developing software at scale
without sacrificing stability, quality, velocity
or code health.
PROGRAMMING LANGUAGES
JAVA
C#/.NET
JAVASCRIPT
HTML / CSS
ANDROID
SKILLS
- Speak and write in English fluently.
- Interest in learning other coding languages.
- Ability to work in group. 
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Adapt quickly to new environment.
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
